net.kuujo.vertigo.io.group

Interface InputGroupSupport<T extends InputGroupSupport<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type to which the support belongs.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Input<T>, InputBatch, InputGroup, InputPort

    public interface InputGroupSupport<T extends InputGroupSupport<T>>
    Support for receiving input groups.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T groupHandler(Handler<InputGroup> handler)
      Registers a group handler.
      T groupHandler(String name, Handler<InputGroup> handler)
      Registers a group handler.

    • Method Detail

      • groupHandler

        T groupHandler(Handler<InputGroup> handler)
        Registers a group handler.
        Parameters:
        handler - The handler to register. This handler will be called whenever any group on the input is started.
        Returns:
        The called object.

      • groupHandler

        T groupHandler(String name,
             Handler<InputGroup> handler)
        Registers a group handler.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the group for which to register the handler.
        handler - The handler to register. This handler will be called whenever a group of the given name is started.
        Returns:
        The called object.
